I'm confident you'll be impressed with its quality and craftsmanship. This time I'm willing to offer you a special discount of 10% if you decide to buy it. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate the discount, but I've seen enough.  I'm not convinced about the quality of your products, and I'm not comfortable risking another $100.  I'm going to pass on this one.  Perhaps you should focus on building trust with your customers before offering discounts.

Alice, I've learned a lot from our interactions, but I'm still not confident in your ability to assess the quality of your products.  I'm going to pass on this one.  Perhaps you can focus on providing more concrete evidence of your products' quality in the future.
